poems.title: Bond of Friendship
poems.author: Emma Johnson
poems.excerpt: A true friend is a treasure, a bond that time cannot sever...
poems.full_text: A true friend is a treasure, a bond that time cannot sever. Through laughter and tears, our friendship grows stronger, a testament to trust and love. In you, I find a confidant, a partner in life's journey.

poems.title: Friends Forever
poems.author: Liam Smith
poems.excerpt: In the garden of life, friends are the flowers that bloom...
poems.full_text: In the garden of life, friends are the flowers that bloom, bringing color and joy to our days. With every shared moment, our roots grow deeper, creating a friendship that stands the test of time.
